website_summaries.verdict: A moderately priced cleansing mask from a trusted brand. Contains aloe vera to sooth skin while detoxifying.
pros: Works well to prevent breakouts for most skin types
Provides a good value for the price
Leaves skin with a matte, non-shiny finish
Removes bacteria, oil, and dead cells
cons: Better at preventing than treating serious breakouts

customer_reviews.title: My favorite masque
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mask, and I buy it religiously. I much prefer the tub verison because I think it makes application and storage easier. This masque is gentle enough to use daily, but I use it about once a week. It does an excellent job of diminishing the appearance of pores and I swear my face looks so radiant after I take it off. It even reduces the red, inflamed look of pimples if yo break down and pick them. You can even use a small dot of it on pimples to completely dry and deflate them overnight! 100X worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sarahndipity.c

customer_reviews.title: Mint Julep Masque
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years (love it!)! I have always gotten the tube version not the jar. My score is for recieving the product damaged and there not being a return option or a contract distributor option. The product itself has always worked great, it's a refreshing smell that's not to overpowering and afterwards my skin feels tight. I generally do this 1-2 times a week to help shrink my pores. It can make your skin feel dry if you don't apply lotion after you use it. I think it is great for oily and broke out skin.
customer_reviews.author: Emily C.

customer_reviews.title: Unsealed product received
customer_reviews.text: Item just arrived and I immediately opened the box. Item appears to have already been opened and I’m not sure if it has been used or not. The product has even separated from the jar. My concern in using an already opened and/or used product is whether or not it has been tampered with. Apparently this item is not eligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Good for redness and oil. Relaxing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is pretty great. My husband and I use this mask at least once a week. We both struggle with acne, oil, and red skin. It helps with redness and oil, but we see no acne relief. I would not recommend using this product daily. It will dry out your skin, even my oily skin was no match for it. We have both tried using this as a spot treatment for problem acne by leaving a dot on a pimple over night. We saw no results. The mask is pretty refreshing. I love the minty smell (delicious!) It really does make our skin look refreshed and revitalized .
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: INNER SEAL WAS BROKEN; PRODUCT DISTURBED
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I can only rate this product based on its beautiful scent and color. I can go no further because when I unscrewed the lid, I discovered that the inner seal had caved into the product and the contents were smeared onto the inside of the lid. The condition was such that it looked like the product might have been used. I have made arrangements with Amazon.com to return the product. The mailing package was fine. No visible damage to the outside. I have no idea what is going on with the manufacturer's quality control but I have seen other Amazon.com reviews that mentioned broken inner seals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans out clogged pores and smells good too!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Easy to smear on, stays good in the jar, and washes right off with plain water. What I really needed was something to clean out the pores, and this stuff is awesome. I also have apricot facial scrub which is like little sand grains, and it cleans the pores only to the surface of the skin. It smooths everything out, but it doesn't get down in there. Queen Helene's mint julep masque does. I can totally feel the difference. Spouse likens me to the Green Hulk or a Green Wicked Witch of the West when I wear it, but it's all in good fun. And we laugh.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Delarose

customer_reviews.title: Good for oily / acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this masque . I have oily acne prone skin, I use this mask twice a week preferably after a shower leave it on for 10-15 minutes then rinse it leaves the skin birghter, smoother and help unclog the pores thus reducing oil and acne, my skin gets little bit red but that doesn't last very long. It arrived fast but I wish it was sealed with a plastic wrap or something.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Damaged/Used product sold to me
customer_reviews.text: First I would like to say I LOVE this product. It is my favorite face mask for keeping an acne free face and the smell is amazing.... However my product came dirty and used. The tamper evident seal was broken and it was missing a huge chunk out of it. So disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use at your own risk!
customer_reviews.text: Did the small spot test. No issues. Followed for directions when using. I felt a little burn and it didn’t feel right so decided to take off. Could you imagine if I left on five minutes! I have environmental allergies. I have used many different scented lotions and facia cleaners. Never had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie S.

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST ACNE MASK. PERIOD.
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!! I cannot emphasize enough how amazing this product is. I have included before and after photos as well. I suffered from moderate acne this year until my mom recommended this miracle mask. I used it every day because I have SUPER oily skin (even though you’re only supposed to use it 1-2 times a week) but I am so grateful for this product because it clears up acne like nothing else. Buy it, it is totally worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lillian F.

customer_reviews.title: Tried and true for problem skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product, on and off, for decades. It’s a tried and true remedy when I develop a blemish or two. I put a glob on it and leave it overnight. In a day or two the spot is nearly gone and it greatly reduces that red, sore look. Also great for a refreshing facial. I haven’t been able to find it in drug stores lately so I was happy to find it here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie B. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Seal was pushed inward, there was masque mix all over the lid and the contents seem to somewhat dried out on top. Haven't tried it yet but it smells like cheap spearmint gum. Weary to try it while damaged, will probably just return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sabato

customer_reviews.title: Works well without irritation.
customer_reviews.text: I used this mask for many years as teen and young adult, 30 or 40 years ago. It kept my acne well under control, and never irritated my very sensitive skin. When my daughter started to get acne in her teen years, I told her about Queen Helene's mint Julep mask, and said I wished I could find some for her. Idid!!! She has now been using it for about 4 years and swears by it. She has now recommended it to many friends with varying degrees of acne, and varying degrees of skin sensitivity. Every one of them has reported improvement in the appearance of their skin! So, I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: mgr1

customer_reviews.title: Packay was messy from shipping but nothing water didn't fix..
customer_reviews.text: One of my friends recommended this mask and I like it a lot! The smell is really nice, it's very cooling, blaming, and it doesn't leave that burning sensation like some other masks do. I use another mask that has cacao and 'acne meds' in it which burns and drys out pores - I use this after to calm my face and prepare for toner with moisturizer. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Mint Mud masque/ mask for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Old fashion facial detox. It's mud in a jar. Pulls out gunk and dries up blackheads. Mint is very strong for some, I'd recommend "mud pack masque" by Queen Helene. It's Spearmint. Don't waste money on other products.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Ashby

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: 1 container last me over 3 years. My first purchase was in January 2017, and here we are in May 2020. It does wonders for my skin, and it smells like double mint gum
customer_reviews.author: SlashnYaoi

customer_reviews.title: Obviously used - DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Opened it to find out that the inner paper covering was smashed into it and was obviously opened but due to the holidays, I completely forgot about it and missed the return window. Will be throwing it out - DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hollywood Pretty Face
customer_reviews.text: This makes my face look like a Celebrity walk down the red carpet Woohoooo! I got this because of my barber he applied this on my face couple times after my hair cut and started to notice my face was looking so fresh and Clean... so I ordered my own and use it at home now!!! Leave it on for as long as you can but greater than 30 mins and then was your face and you’ll feel the freshness. I do it every 2 or 3 nights beforr I get a shower and go to bed or before I go out
customer_reviews.author: John Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: This clay mask smells amazing and has a really nice texture
customer_reviews.text: This clay mask smells amazing and has a really nice texture, but it burns. Not like a chemical burn, but if you've ever gotten peppermint or spearmint oil on your face, it feels like that. I actually kind of like it, but if you have sensitive skin or if you're worried about it stinging, don't buy it. Also, the mint overpowers the lime, so it's not so much mint julep as it is just spearmint.
customer_reviews.author: Maren Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Great Facial Mask
customer_reviews.text: Queen Helene has wonderful products. I use their mineral foot soak and body lotion. I don't believe you have to pay a lot of money to have a fine product that works. Don't think by paying more you will get better results. Its all psychological and marketing. I highly recommend this mask. I do not have oily skin but it doesn't dry my face out either. I think this is appropriate for all skin types. I use this 2 times per week in winter and 3 times per week in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Color CreativelyTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: I've always been a fan of this masque. It ...
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a fan of this masque. It masks my skin so clear and refreshed after use. A++ in my book. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Xangai

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I love Queen Helene products ! This is no exception ! It’s minty fresh & pulls all the junk out of my giant pores & refines them
customer_reviews.author: madcowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Love This Product
customer_reviews.text: Best face mask! I made the purchase on amazon because here in South Florida it is difficult to find. I told My 13 year old daughter to try it, she did and she loves it. I’ve been using this specific face mask for over 10 years! Love it. Love the smell and the feeling it leaves once I’m done cleaning it off of my face.
customer_reviews.author: Chele DelP

customer_reviews.title: so far so good! I have dry skin with adult acne
customer_reviews.text: so far so good! I have dry skin with adult acne. I was worried of trying this but its been working well for me. I only use it once a week and then spot treatment every now and then. I haven't seen a huge improvement yet, but it isnt damaging my skin either. I love the smell and it tingles so nicely. I love the price of this mask and hope it helps my acne!
customer_reviews.author: suzysoextra

customer_reviews.title: Exploded in transit
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is awesome. The mask helps my appearance of pores and also helps to keep my oiliness at bay. It also smells amazing and the mint tingles when you put it on. My main complaint is that when they shipped it, they didn’t close it tight enough so it exploded inside the shipping package. I was able to get most of it back inside the container but I shouldn’t have to clean up a new item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True Problem Solver
customer_reviews.text: Used this product in the late 90s/early 2000s as a teenager. The store I was shopping with went out of business. Fast forward to 2019 my skin starting to break out & tried everything but nothing worked. So a bulb clicked in my head so I decided to look up this product because I had it worked so well. This products ie: Drys up acne, close large pores, fix blemishes... just a true problem solver! I totally recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Nikkii Adams

customer_reviews.title: Staple since middle school!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a staple for me since 6th grade! The packaging has changed but the results are still the same! HIGHLY recommend this product to anyone that doesn't have sensitive skin (because it's definitely meant for those with acne problems who need something strong that works!)
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Houske

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work(for me)
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay. I don’t see huge improvements after using this so I’m kinda disappointed. I’ve had it for almost half a year and wanted to see if it had long term results before reviewing but it doesn’t have any really on me
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Good mask
customer_reviews.text: This is a refreshing mask, I wish it was better packaged, it can be messy. but it tingles and feels nice. leaves pores looking more clean. dont love the smell
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: A lovely and simple product
customer_reviews.text: I was told about this product years ago... Simple to use and you can see working... No muss no fuss. A large amount for a low price. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Wright

customer_reviews.title: Used merchandise
customer_reviews.text: I used to use this product and loved it. Unfortunately this order arrived late, was not sealed and had obviously been used by someone before it was shipped to me.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING! I have large pores
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! I have large pores, oily skin and moderate breakouts and boy does this tackle and soothe those skin issues! Great product to give your self a mini spa day with; smells great, goes on smooth and simply works! This particular one comes with plenty to store in smaller containers for on the go or travel use if you need a pick me up when you're not in the comforts of home.
customer_reviews.author: Sirvard

customer_reviews.title: and my skin is fine! It feels soft and cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have ridiculously sensitive skin. Whenever I try out a new skin care product, I get nervous because my skin literally reacts to everything. Somehow this mask sooths my irritated, itchy skin. I don't know how, but it does. The stingy mint sensation goes away after a couple of minutes, and my skin is fine! It feels soft and cleaner. If my skin is okay with this mask, it means it's safe :)
customer_reviews.author: nayon

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: Only skin masque I use and works wonders! I have very oily skin and this dries out the oil and makes my face nice and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great, but cracked packaging
customer_reviews.text: The masque came with the bottom cracked, but it was okay because there’s two layers of plastic separating the mask. The product itself is bomb, really tightens my pores, but the product from the seller was just damaged when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Good for pores
customer_reviews.text: My acne is pretty bad, and for me, the only thing that helped was visiting the dermatologist. However, I still use this mask once every few weeks. I'm not sure if it helps with my acne, but it definitely seems to help clear out my pores.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: I used to LOVE Queen Helene when I was in college
customer_reviews.text: I used to LOVE Queen Helene when I was in college. My roommate and I would religiously put this on our face at night and my skin felt like a million bucks after I washed it off. It's been about 10 years, so it might be that my skin is much different than it used to be, but I feel like the Queen doesn't have the same oomph it used to. Also, this container is HUGE. I will probably never go through all of this, but it's nice to have on hand for a night when I want to do a mask, but don't want to whip out my fancy ones.
customer_reviews.author: ListMaker26

customer_reviews.title: Great masque!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Great masque, does a deep cleanse on my face. Doesn't dry my face out at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kim McQuade

customer_reviews.title: Dries fast , doesn't smell, really works.
customer_reviews.text: This cold green cream is life! Both my husband and I use this on our very different skins. The mask alleviates irritated skin, depuffs inflamed under-eye, clears problem areas (it isn't just for your face) and zaps pimples overnight. You feel firmer softer calm skin immediately after washing; Just like a baby tho you felt like pizza right before! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: The Huffmans

customer_reviews.title: Love that it comes in a jar
customer_reviews.text: Have been using Queen Helene Clay Masque for eons....(I'm 76)....I like that it's in a jar. While browsing Amazon I found Queen H has a a range of products....one facial wash product smells delightfully like cookies.
customer_reviews.author: itsjoan

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: My product arrived damaged and apparently I can't get a replacement. There was some masque missing from inside, and the container is about 1/2 full.The white is the protective cover to ensure quality and it has clearly been broken--likely tampered with! I'm very dissatisfied. Know there's a chance of this happening to you.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Been around for long time still one of simplest and best
customer_reviews.text: Oldie but goodie works best after shower or washing face the thinner the application the better love this classic mask.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: If the packaging doesn’t break the product then maybe it would work
customer_reviews.text: There was no packaging inside the box so the jar bursts. It’s not even worth getting the money back. I’m extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product forever. It leaves my skin feeling so clean like nothing else I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.author: Judith Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask! I use it whenever I wash my hair which is once a week. It’s so refreshing! It always makes me face look brighter and more clear.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS GREAT! FEELS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using QH products for a while now. This is one of my favorite masks because it smells amazing and really leaves your skin soft without the irritation like other masks can do. I have oily/semi acne prone skin(period breakouts) I use this mask on my whole face twice a week and I will also use it as a spot treatment to dry out pimples. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: ari perez

customer_reviews.title: Remove black rings around the nose
customer_reviews.text: With me If I get a pimple on Wednesday and apply this 2X a day it will be gone by Saturday. Good to take the soreness out of the blackhead in your ear.
customer_reviews.author: LuvLee Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice minty feeling when put on, and it really makes my skin feel fresh and clean after use. Not really a good remedy for pimples, in my experience, but good for blackheads. Giving it 4 stars because it tends to burn a little sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Shishkabob

customer_reviews.title: Really great
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is that this product will clog your sink's drain after a while of using it. Perhaps it's best to rise it off in the shower instead. Otherwise, it's an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: like not immediately but i have noticed a difference
customer_reviews.text: literally every-time i use this mask my skin feel so soft and redness calms down a-lot. also help with acne, like not immediately but i have noticed a difference
customer_reviews.author: Winston’s mom

customer_reviews.title: Shopper
customer_reviews.text: This mask works! It pulls out dirt and unclog pores making hour pores appear smaller. Worth every dime if not more!
customer_reviews.author: Laayjamiky

customer_reviews.title: Can’t use cause it arrived opened.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived and it was opened. Now I have to go through the hassle of returning it. Not very happy.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: My container was open and not sealed, so it squished all over the packaging. Such a waste of product.
customer_reviews.author: shanna banana

customer_reviews.title: It's really easy to use and it makes your skin look healthy ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is an oldie but a goodie! I can immediately tell a difference in the size of my pores as soon as I rinse it off. It's really easy to use and it makes your skin look healthy and vibrant. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: K Mead

customer_reviews.title: Great staple
customer_reviews.text: This is a go to for treating breakouts and redness on my face and neck.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole T.

customer_reviews.title: Standard face mask
customer_reviews.text: Feels good on your skin but I am not sure if it's helped my acne at all.
customer_reviews.author: fancy parrot kitty

customer_reviews.title: Great mask for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I use this mask every morning for my super oily skin, and it keeps me shine free all day. It really dries out the skin though so I would not recommend for people with sensitive/dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reformulated??
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years. This jar however is different. It smells more minty and stings a bit. Still works the same though, great for deep cleaning and temporarily shrinking large pores. Though it may be irritating if you have very sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask. You feel it work, and leave skin oil free. Acne demishe gradually. Feels super clean.
customer_reviews.author: Yoha

customer_reviews.title: Was looking forward to getting this mask because of all ...
customer_reviews.text: Was looking forward to getting this mask because of all the reviews, but just wasn't impressed. I got the beloved benonite clay for cheaper and have seen incredible results.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Ciocia

customer_reviews.title: It works very well.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. I have been using it for about 15 years. It goes on smooth and has a minty scent. It feels refreshing and helps with clogged pores AND existing acne by gently drying it out.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa A. Necochea

customer_reviews.title: Are you a lady of leisure? This is for you!
customer_reviews.text: Put this in your fridge and it will feel even more amazing and last forever! I keep mine refrigerated and there is a noticeable difference. This jar is huge, I use it several times a week and it barely looks like I touched it. Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a very good product. Been using this for years.
customer_reviews.author: J. O'keefe

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pretty pores
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for green masks everywhere and it’s like the stores stopped selling them. This one is great! I get clear pores and I can scare my dog!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Product NOT sealed
customer_reviews.text: Product was NOT sealed upon arrival. I am not sure if it was used and returned then reshipped. Overall its the product I wanted, but its a safety concern if the product is not sealed and possibly have been handled by other people.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferRoze

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this masque
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this masque. It makes my skin feel so good and has helped me clear up my skin in just a few weeks. I made it apart of my weekly routine.
customer_reviews.author: A Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Queen Helene has been a favorite product of mine for a coupe of decades. It is very economical and produces great results. I have extremely sensitive skin and this product does not irritate my skin. The product was extremely cost-effective, well packaged and arrived when promised. I highly recommend the product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Nice tight mask
customer_reviews.text: Oh this feels great as it tightens your face. My skin feels smooth after use so don’t hesitate, order this product
customer_reviews.author: Christine Ellen

customer_reviews.title: I will never go back to any other acne product
customer_reviews.text: This product helped me with my cystic acne breakout. I’ve tried so many products for my cystic acne and nothing seemed to work. I’ve been using this once a week as recommended by my dermatologist, and have notice a huge difference. I am beyond happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: BETSY

customer_reviews.title: First product I received was completely dried out. Could ...
customer_reviews.text: First product I received was completely dried out. Could barely scoop it out with my finger. Contacted the seller and requested a replacement. When the replacement came, it had a similar, dry consistency. I emailed the seller inquiring and received a non-response telling me that they always verify quality with the manufacturer. They didn't verify enough because these are clearly dried out/old
customer_reviews.author: Jack O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: New favorite mask.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask! It smells so good and is so refreshing. Definitely has helped clear up my acne. All the ladies in my family are about to get this for Christmas for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amber B.

customer_reviews.title: Mint Julep is my favorite
customer_reviews.text: My skin feels so soft and clean after using this. It isn't dried out or overly oily afterwards. I have oily skin and small whiteheads appear on my chin often. Hoping this will help clear them up. My skin is very sensitive, this is tingly but feels great. I've used this many times before and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gillian

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Product came with a broken seal under lid and the masque oozed out all over the box. There is no return policy so I have to throw the product away and consider it a loss. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Katti Suter

customer_reviews.title: Clean and refreshing
customer_reviews.text: Has a refreshing, tingling sensation upon application and leaves my skin smooth and clean with a nice glow. Haven't seen much in pore size and acne reduction, but still a nice mask
customer_reviews.author: JSmitten

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin
customer_reviews.text: These work really great! I love the big size. I am so glad that they make the bigger one. After I use it my face always seems softer and feels better. Whenever I break out I love using this.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: It's still a good product, just not great anymore
customer_reviews.text: The packaging has changed and the product seems seems a little more liquid. It's still a good product, just not great anymore. I would apply it to a blemish overnight and POOF! clear skin the next morning. Now, not so much. It's still tingly, just not as drying.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Almonte-Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: I use this daily (when needed). Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this for anyone who is wanting a cheaper, but just as effective, alternative to the expensive face masks that places like lush or Sephora sell. It works really well and makes your face feel super refreshed. The only downfall is that it can sometimes be difficult to get off- I recommend using a makeup or baby wipe instead of just water.
customer_reviews.author: Haylee

customer_reviews.title: This is by far my favorite face mask that I've ever tried
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite face mask that I've ever tried. Large pores look INSTANTLY smaller and my face always feels smooth afterwards. I was so excited when I found this on here because the drug stores by me stopped carrying it. If you have oily/combination skin with large pores this is the mask for you!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Maiorino

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: One of the best face products I have ever used! I will definitely buy it again. Not only is it relatively inexpensive, but it actually works! My pores are smaller and clear, it cleared up my (mild) acne, and it smells great! You can get many uses out of one tub. It also leaves my skin feeling fresh and clean! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel C.

customer_reviews.title: It feels good to the skin when applied buts that’s it
customer_reviews.text: It actually leaves my skin overly dry. Can’t say it does what it claims to do. It feels good to the skin when applied buts that’s it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product Great seller
customer_reviews.text: Sealed and brand new. Perfect product for oily summer skin!! Great seller
customer_reviews.author: PositiveLiving

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff for my acne. Very refreshing for my pores. I use it 3 times a week
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Nice, refreshing mask. I've tried quite a few different kinds and brands and this one really is best. In terms of price for the amount you get (I got the tub for 7$), it can't be beat. It leaves my skin with that tight feeling and it feels super clean. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because it didn't dry my pimples overnight like another reviewer said. Other than that, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Kuhne

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful mask!
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved this mask! My face feels tighter and so clean. The only con to this product is you're husband laughingly calling you The Hulk. Pffft.
customer_reviews.author: Chrysanthe

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Used to use this product as a teen, when was sold in stores. They have a new look, but so far love that smell and my oily skin feels smooth and dry like I like.
customer_reviews.author: kenisha jones

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price for a massive amount of product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing price for a massive amount of product. I’be been using it approximately twice a week for several months and the results were almost immediate. The smell is very minty and you can feel the mintiness through your skin when you put it on but it isn’t overwhelming. Definitely plan on repurchasing once I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Millie

customer_reviews.title: THIS STUFF IS THE BOMB DIGGIDY BABY!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff. I have tried other masque and nothing compares to this. It dries up white heads like crazy and leaves skin smooth. It is a must have for my beauty routine.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: A classic!
customer_reviews.text: My holy grail mud mask. I use it once a week or so, and it really helps de-congest my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Ally Armacost

customer_reviews.title: Opened/Used?
customer_reviews.text: Product came opened and was all over the container. It looks like it was used before.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia S

customer_reviews.title: Been using this forever
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried many masks.. but I keep coming back to this one.. been using since I was a youngster.. tried and true
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: I miss the squeeze packaging because this gets under my ...
customer_reviews.text: I miss the squeeze packaging because this gets under my fingernails. I don't know if the formula is different, but I really miss the old product.
customer_reviews.author: FrogOnMyToe

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing! I have been searching for a face mask ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I have been searching for a face mask and this stuff is exactly what I have been looking for. Not only does this mask make my face feel clean and refreshed, but the mint julep is also a nice scent. If you want your face to feel great, get this face mask!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Smith

customer_reviews.title: I love this masque
customer_reviews.text: I love this masque. I've used it once a week for years, but during the times I've forgotten to restock when I need it, my skin definitely suffers. My skin is quite acne prone, and this gives it a little boost, and the mintiness feels great!
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Noethe

customer_reviews.title: Can irritate sensitive skins
customer_reviews.text: I know it's "mint julep" but damn it has a lot of peppermint oil in it- it really irritated my Rosacea. I would pass on this if you have sensitive skins. I also don't like the tub vs tube packaging- dried out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: I like the jar v
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years. I like the jar v. tube container better. Definitely helps with drying out inflamed blemishes, exfoliation. Lasts forever in jar
customer_reviews.author: di

customer_reviews.title: Different formula? Watery
customer_reviews.text: I usually get this in the tube. When I went to re-order I read some bad reviews that they changed the formula so it's now watery. I decided to go with the tub instead. Well, this is really watery compared to the tube I just used up. Not sure if I like it :(
customer_reviews.author: Kisa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this face mask. It smells wonderful and feels soothing on my skin. It really leaves my skin feeling clean and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Ada S.

customer_reviews.title: This is the first I bought in a jar - was getting annoyed with trying to get it out of a tube ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product since I was a teen. It shrinks pores and makes my skin glow. This is the first I bought in a jar - was getting annoyed with trying to get it out of a tube so this works much better !!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. Super thick. Smells fresh and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: awesome product
customer_reviews.text: this smells great and it leaves the skin tingly . I like it
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

product_meta.title: Queen Helene Mint Julep Masque, 12 Ounce
product_meta.description: Mint julep masque is the original natural home treatment developed by a dermatologist that helps dry up acne pimples, rinse away blackheads and shrink enlarged pores. Simply apply mint julep masque to your clean face and neck. Within minutes it firms and hardens, drawing out impurities from your pores. After the masque is removed, your skin will feel clean, refreshed and smooth
feature_bullets: Mint julep masque is a refreshing facial treatment
Helps relaxed tired muscles and ease tension lines on the face and neck
Helps dry up acne pimples, rinse away blackheads and shrink enlarged pores
